text: The Adventures of Paddington Bear is a Canadian and French animated childrens television series. It is co-produced by CINAR Corporation and Protécréa in co- production with Canal J (Season 1-2), with the participation of Teletoon ITV (Season 1-2) and TF1. The series aired in the United States on Qubo from 2018 to 2021 and then PBS Kids (under Connecticut Public Television and WNET). Category:1997 Canadian television series debuts Category:2000 Canadian television series endings Category:Children's television series
title: The Adventures of Paddington Bear
